AzureADB2C.ClientId: {your application Client ID from Azure B2C app registration}
AzureADB2C.ClientSecret: {your application Client Secret from Azure B2C app registration}

apimIdentitifer: {APIM Management API identifier from Azure APIM portal Management API blade}
apimKey: {APIM Management API Key from Azure APIM portal Management API blade}
apimUrl: {APIM Management API URL from Azure APIM portal Management API blade}
delegationValidationKey: {your APIM delegation key from the Azure APIM portal delegate blade}
